extendedInfo.description: Do you have low self-esteem?Does it affect your relationships?Does it prevent you from being successful at work?Are you unhappy with yourself?Do you have problems with anxiety and/or depression?Then, this app may be for you. This app was developed by a clinical psychologist using the methods of cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) to help improve self-esteem.We all have a sense of self. Whether that sense of self is positive or negative is based upon our experiences in life and our perceptions and assessment of ourself.WHAT IS SELF-ESTEEM?Self-esteem is the regard or respect that a person has for oneself. A person with positive feelings regarding the self is said to have high self-esteem. However, self-esteem can refer to very specific areas as well as a general feeling about the self. WHAT ARE THE CHARACTERISTICS OF LOW SELF-ESTEEM?1) Feelings of unhappiness. 2) Feelings of anxiety.3) Feelings of inferiority or superiority.4) Impatience or irritation with self or others.5) Externally oriented goals. 6) Negativity. WHAT ARE CHARACTERISTICS OF HIGH SELF-ESTEEM?1) Responsibility.2) Goal commitment.3) Genuineness.4) Forgiving.5) Internal values.6) Positivity.7) Self-improvement.Contents:***Articles about self-esteem and cognitive-behavioral therapy***Test: What Is Your Self-Concept?***Create positive self-talk on the the Self-Esteem Blackboard***Review the affirmations on your blackboard***Self-Esteem Assistance Audio to change self-talk created by past experiences***Self-Esteem Blackboard Audio to help visualize changing your self-talk***Relaxation audiosFeatures:***Password protection***Email your affirmation list and test resultsReason for permissions:1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audiosMotivational rewards now available!***Sign-up for AchieveMint.com and earn points to redeem for cash whenever you engage in the self-improvement activities in this app.***This is an advertiser-sponsored program but you have control over whether you want to participate and you get paid for participating.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I\'m amazed by the quality and real-world individual help this and any every other app the Developer has created for free. Paid apps don\'t come close to being the tool for ACTUAL RESULTS in my life. The website has enormous amount of material and I haven\'t had any issues with utilizing the apps on various mobile devices. THANK YOU!
reviews.author: J M

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: What an eye opener and truly identifies my weaknesses and then has a solution to corrrect irrational thinking and my self-worth/self-esteem. Best app I have downloaded,used and am excited to change my future for the better. Thank you a million times..
reviews.author: cathy o\'connell

reviews.title: Terrible UI
reviews.comment: Just terrible. At least the test didn\'t infuriate me with inaccurate data-recording like the Worry Box did, but it was VERY difficult to read the relevant data since it took up maybe a quarter of the screen.  Uninstalled immediately after taking test.  Who on earth would download such a horrible thing just to read about these topics?  I\'ll stick with my web browser or Instapaper for offline emergencies.
reviews.author: Lisa Paul

reviews.title: This app is wonderful
reviews.comment: Wow. This app is user friendly.  Allows you to customize. And most of all, this app is accurate and understandable for the lay man. I appreciate this app. Its brilliant.  Well done. Highly recommend
reviews.author: Sona-Lee Lorrick

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Im very sceptical of apps like these and ive tried quite a few,but I also understand it doesn\'t work for everyone,but this one is awesome!! the womans calm american voice on the audio,soothes and calms me and gives me some kind of enthusiasm,id defo recommend! 5*! THANK YOU!!
reviews.author: Ramira Fernandez

reviews.title: I like it. Minor issue
reviews.comment: Date does not always default to current day when writing an entry. Have yet to figure out what I\'m doing wrong or if it is really a bug.
reviews.author: Eddy Morrow

reviews.comment: Very accurate with the test results. I recommend this to those who are trying to understand areas of improvements
reviews.author: Bea M

reviews.title: fabulous
reviews.comment: this is the best informative application i have ever downloaded. thank you

reviews.title: No audio
reviews.comment: I love the excel at life apps. The problem with this one is that the audio ismt playing for me. The others work fine.

reviews.comment: Awesome app! Very helpful

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app. Thanks so much!
reviews.author: Margaret Carreon

reviews.title: Very good app!
reviews.comment: I need to start back meditating again and this is the best way to ease back in. Also the esteem test was right on target. I was really amazed!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have this app and the CBT diary one and together they are 5star apps. It\'s already changing my life. Much read the articles to really understand
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: Helpful. Persistent use will remind you of your good qualities, and help to diminish the negative voices which have built up since childhood. Her caring voice is a benefit in that regard. The blackboard audio is a bit echoey, while her other audios are not, but you can\'t beat free...
reviews.author: Andrea Wisner

reviews.title: Download now!
reviews.comment: Thank you so much. Well worded and detailed, the articles have really resonated. Have not done audio yet but feel so inspired to rationally and realistically go for all that I deserve. Only problem is the layout is a bit clunky as is the visual design of app.
reviews.author: Mel king

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I just downloaded and have seen a slight improvment. If I stay consistent this will be a reall help. Thanks!!!!!
